WizardSpells.Name: Alarm
WizardSpells.Description: You set an alarm against unwanted intrusion.

WizardSpells.Name: Burning Hands
WizardSpells.Description: As you hold your hands with thumbs touching and fingers spread, a thin sheet of flames shoots forth from your outstretched fingertips.

WizardSpells.Name: Charm Person
WizardSpells.Description: You attempt to charm a humanoid you can see within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Color Spray
WizardSpells.Description: A dazzling array of flashing, colored light springs from your hand.

WizardSpells.Name: Comprehend Languages
WizardSpells.Description: For the duration, you understand the literal meaning of any spoken language that you hear.

WizardSpells.Name: Detect Magic
WizardSpells.Description: For the duration, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you.

WizardSpells.Name: Disguise Self
WizardSpells.Description: You make yourself—including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person—look different until the spell ends.

WizardSpells.Name: Expeditious Retreat
WizardSpells.Description: This spell allows you to move at an incredible pace.

WizardSpells.Name: False Life
WizardSpells.Description: Bolstering yourself with a necromantic facsimile of life, you gain 1d4 + 4 temporary hit points for the duration.

WizardSpells.Name: Feather Fall
WizardSpells.Description: Choose up to five falling creatures within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Find Familiar
WizardSpells.Description: You gain the service of a familiar, a spirit that takes an animal form you choose.

WizardSpells.Name: Floating Disk
WizardSpells.Description: This spell creates a circular, horizontal plane of force, 3 feet in diameter and 1 inch thick.

WizardSpells.Name: Fog Cloud
WizardSpells.Description: You create a 20-foot-radius sphere of fog centered on a point within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Grease
WizardSpells.Description: Slick grease covers the ground in a 10-foot square centered on a point within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Hideous Laughter
WizardSpells.Description: The creature of your choice that you can see within range perceives everything as hilariously funny and falls into fits of laughter.

WizardSpells.Name: Identify
WizardSpells.Description: You choose one object that you must touch throughout the casting of the spell.

WizardSpells.Name: Illusory Script
WizardSpells.Description: You write on parchment, paper, or some other suitable writing material and imbue it with a potent illusion that lasts for the duration.

WizardSpells.Name: Jump
WizardSpells.Description: You touch a creature. The creature's jump distance is tripled until the spell ends.

WizardSpells.Name: Longstrider
WizardSpells.Description: You touch a creature. The target's speed increases by 10 feet until the spell ends.

WizardSpells.Name: Mage Armor
WizardSpells.Description: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor, and a protective magical force surrounds it until the spell ends.

WizardSpells.Name: Magic Missile
WizardSpells.Description: You create three glowing darts of magical force.

WizardSpells.Name: Protection from Evil and Good
WizardSpells.Description: Until the spell ends, one willing creature you touch is protected against certain types of creatures.

WizardSpells.Name: Shield
WizardSpells.Description: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you.

WizardSpells.Name: Silent Image
WizardSpells.Description: You create the image of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon.

WizardSpells.Name: Sleep
WizardSpells.Description: This spell sends creatures into a magical slumber.

WizardSpells.Name: Thunderwave
WizardSpells.Description: A wave of thunderous force sweeps out from you.

WizardSpells.Name: Unseen Servant
WizardSpells.Description: This spell creates an invisible, mindless, shapeless force that performs simple tasks at your command until the spell ends.

WizardSpells.Name: Acid Arrow
WizardSpells.Description: A shimmering green arrow streaks toward a target within range and bursts in a spray of acid.

WizardSpells.Name: Alter Self
WizardSpells.Description: You assume a different form.

WizardSpells.Name: Arcane Lock
WizardSpells.Description: You touch a closed door, window, gate, chest, or other entryway, and it becomes locked for the duration.

WizardSpells.Name: Arcanist's Magic Aura
WizardSpells.Description: You place an illusion on a creature or an object you touch so that divination spells reveal false information about it.

WizardSpells.Name: Blindness/Deafness
WizardSpells.Description: You can blind or deafen a foe.

WizardSpells.Name: Blur
WizardSpells.Description: Your body becomes blurred, shifting and wavering to all who can see you.

WizardSpells.Name: Continual Flame
WizardSpells.Description: A flame, equivalent in brightness to a torch, springs forth from an object that you touch.

WizardSpells.Name: Darkness
WizardSpells.Description: Magical darkness spreads from a point you choose within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Darkvision
WizardSpells.Description: You touch a willing creature to grant it the ability to see in the dark.

WizardSpells.Name: Detect Thoughts
WizardSpells.Description: For the duration, you can read the thoughts of certain creatures.

WizardSpells.Name: Enlarge/Reduce
WizardSpells.Description: You cause a creature or an object you can see within range to grow larger or smaller for the duration.

WizardSpells.Name: Flaming Sphere
WizardSpells.Description: A 5-foot-diameter sphere of fire appears in an unoccupied space of your choice within range and lasts for the duration.

WizardSpells.Name: Gentle Repose
WizardSpells.Description: You touch a corpse or other remains.

WizardSpells.Name: Gust of Wind
WizardSpells.Description: A line of strong wind 60 feet long and 10 feet wide blasts from you in a direction you choose for the spell's duration.

WizardSpells.Name: Hold Person
WizardSpells.Description: The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration.

WizardSpells.Name: Invisibility
WizardSpells.Description: A creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends.

WizardSpells.Name: Knock
WizardSpells.Description: Choose an object that you can see within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Levitate
WizardSpells.Description: One creature or object of your choice that you can see within range rises vertically, up to 20 feet, and remains suspended there for the duration.

WizardSpells.Name: Locate Object
WizardSpells.Description: Describe or name an object that is familiar to you.

WizardSpells.Name: Magic Mouth
WizardSpells.Description: You implant a message within an object in range, a message that is uttered when a trigger condition is met.

WizardSpells.Name: Magic Weapon
WizardSpells.Description: You touch a nonmagical weapon.

WizardSpells.Name: Mirror Image
WizardSpells.Description: Three illusory duplicates of yourself appear in your space.

WizardSpells.Name: Misty Step
WizardSpells.Description: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.

WizardSpells.Name: Ray of Enfeeblement
WizardSpells.Description: A black beam of enervating energy springs from your finger toward a creature within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Rope Trick
WizardSpells.Description: You touch a length of rope that is up to 60 feet long.

WizardSpells.Name: Scorching Ray
WizardSpells.Description: You create three rays of fire and hurl them at targets within range.

WizardSpells.Name: See Invisibility
WizardSpells.Description: For the duration, you see invisible creatures and objects as if they were visible.

WizardSpells.Name: Shatter
WizardSpells.Description: A sudden loud ringing noise, painfully intense, erupts from a point of your choice within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Spider Climb
WizardSpells.Description: Until the spell ends, one willing creature you touch gains the ability to move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and upside down along ceilings, while leaving its hands free.

WizardSpells.Name: Suggestion
WizardSpells.Description: You suggest a course of activity (limited to a sentence or two) and magically influence a creature you can see within range that can hear and understand you.

WizardSpells.Name: Web
WizardSpells.Description: You conjure a mass of thick, sticky webbing at a point of your choice within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Animate Dead
WizardSpells.Description: This spell creates an undead servant.

WizardSpells.Name: Bestow Curse
WizardSpells.Description: You touch a creature, and that creature must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become cursed for the duration of the spell.

WizardSpells.Name: Blink
WizardSpells.Description: Roll a d20 at the end of each of your turns for the duration of the spell.

WizardSpells.Name: Clairvoyance
WizardSpells.Description: You create an invisible sensor within range in a location familiar to you (a place you have visited or seen before) or in an obvious location that is unfamiliar to you.

WizardSpells.Name: Counterspell
WizardSpells.Description: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell.

WizardSpells.Name: Dispel Magic
WizardSpells.Description: Choose one creature, object, or magical effect within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Fear
WizardSpells.Description: You project a phantasmal image of a creature's worst fears.

WizardSpells.Name: Fireball
WizardSpells.Description: A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range and then blossoms with a low roar into an explosion of flame.

WizardSpells.Name: Fly
WizardSpells.Description: You touch a willing creature. The target gains a flying speed of 60 feet for the duration.

WizardSpells.Name: Gaseous Form
WizardSpells.Description: You transform a willing creature you touch, along with everything it's wearing and carrying, into a misty cloud for the duration.

WizardSpells.Name: Glyph of Warding
WizardSpells.Description: When you cast this spell, you inscribe a glyph that harms other creatures, either upon a surface (such as a table or a section of floor or wall) or within an object that can be closed (such as a book, a scroll, or a treasure chest) to conceal the glyph.

WizardSpells.Name: Haste
WizardSpells.Description: Choose a willing creature that you can see within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Hypnotic Pattern
WizardSpells.Description: You create a twisting pattern of colors that weaves through the air inside a 30-foot cube within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Lightning Bolt
WizardSpells.Description: A stroke of lightning forming a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide blasts out from you in a direction you choose.

WizardSpells.Name: Magic Circle
WizardSpells.Description: You create a 10-foot-radius, 20-foot-tall cylinder of magical energy centered on a point on the ground that you can see within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Major Image
WizardSpells.Description: You create the image of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon that is no larger than a 20-foot cube.

WizardSpells.Name: Nondetection
WizardSpells.Description: For the duration, you hide a target that you touch from divination magic.

WizardSpells.Name: Phantom Steed
WizardSpells.Description: A Large quasi-real, horselike creature appears on the ground in an unoccupied space of your choice within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Protection from Energy
WizardSpells.Description: For the duration, the willing creature you touch has resistance to one damage type of your choice: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder.

WizardSpells.Name: Remove Curse
WizardSpells.Description: At your touch, all curses affecting one creature or object end.

WizardSpells.Name: Sending
WizardSpells.Description: You send a short message of twenty-five words or less to a creature with which you are familiar.

WizardSpells.Name: Sleet Storm
WizardSpells.Description: Until the spell ends, freezing rain and sleet fall in a 20-foot-tall cylinder with a 40-foot radius centered on a point you choose within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Slow
WizardSpells.Description: You alter time around up to six creatures of your choice in a 40-foot cube within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Stinking Cloud
WizardSpells.Description: You create a 20-foot-radius sphere of yellow, nauseating gas centered on a point within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Tiny Hut
WizardSpells.Description: A 10-foot-radius immobile dome of force springs into existence around and above you and remains stationary for the duration.

WizardSpells.Name: Tongues
WizardSpells.Description: This spell grants the creature you touch the ability to understand any spoken language it hears.

WizardSpells.Name: Vampiric Touch
WizardSpells.Description: The touch of your shadow-wreathed hand can siphon life force from others to heal your wounds.

WizardSpells.Name: Water Breathing
WizardSpells.Description: This spell grants up to ten willing creatures you can see within range the ability to breathe underwater until the spell ends.

WizardSpells.Name: Arcane Eye
WizardSpells.Description: You create an invisible, magical eye within range that hovers in the air for the duration.

WizardSpells.Name: Banishment
WizardSpells.Description: You attempt to send one creature that you can see within range to another plane of existence.

WizardSpells.Name: Black Tentacles
WizardSpells.Description: Squirming, ebony tentacles fill a 20-foot square on the ground that you can see within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Blight
WizardSpells.Description: Necromantic energy washes over a creature of your choice that you can see within range, draining moisture and vitality from it.

WizardSpells.Name: Confusion
WizardSpells.Description: This spell assaults and twists creatures' minds, spawning delusions and provoking uncontrolled action.

WizardSpells.Name: Conjure Minor Elementals
WizardSpells.Description: You summon elementals that appear in unoccupied spaces that you can see within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Control Water
WizardSpells.Description: Until the spell ends, you control any freestanding water inside an area you choose that is a cube up to 100 feet on a side.

WizardSpells.Name: Dimension Door
WizardSpells.Description: You teleport yourself from your current location to any other spot within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Fabricate
WizardSpells.Description: You convert raw materials into products of the same material.

WizardSpells.Name: Faithful Hound
WizardSpells.Description: You conjure a phantom watchdog in an unoccupied space that you can see within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Fire Shield
WizardSpells.Description: Thin and wispy flames wreathe your body for the duration, shedding bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

WizardSpells.Name: Greater Invisibility
WizardSpells.Description: You or a creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends.

WizardSpells.Name: Hallucinatory Terrain
WizardSpells.Description: You make natural terrain in a 150-foot cube in range look, sound, and smell like some other sort of natural terrain.

WizardSpells.Name: Ice Storm
WizardSpells.Description: A hail of rock-hard ice pounds to the ground in a 20-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on a point within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Locate Creature
WizardSpells.Description: Describe or name a creature that is familiar to you.

WizardSpells.Name: Phantasmal Killer
WizardSpells.Description: You tap into the nightmares of a creature you can see within range and create an illusory manifestation of its deepest fears.

WizardSpells.Name: Polymorph
WizardSpells.Description: This spell transforms a creature that you can see within range into a new form.

WizardSpells.Name: Private Sanctum
WizardSpells.Description: You make an area within range magically secure.

WizardSpells.Name: Resilient Sphere
WizardSpells.Description: A sphere of shimmering force encloses a creature or object of Large size or smaller within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Secret Chest
WizardSpells.Description: You hide a chest, and all its contents, on the Ethereal Plane.

WizardSpells.Name: Stone Shape
WizardSpells.Description: You touch a stone object of Medium size or smaller or a section of stone no more than 5 feet in any dimension and form it into any shape that suits your purpose.

WizardSpells.Name: Stoneskin
WizardSpells.Description: This spell turns the flesh of a willing creature you touch as hard as stone.

WizardSpells.Name: Wall of Fire
WizardSpells.Description: You create a wall of fire on a solid surface within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Animate Objects
WizardSpells.Description: Objects come to life at your command.

WizardSpells.Name: Arcane Hand
WizardSpells.Description: You create a Large hand of shimmering, translucent force in an unoccupied space that you can see within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Cloudkill
WizardSpells.Description: You create a 20-foot-radius sphere of poisonous, yellow-green fog centered on a point you choose within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Cone of Cold
WizardSpells.Description: A blast of cold air erupts from your hands.

WizardSpells.Name: Conjure Elemental
WizardSpells.Description: You call forth an elemental servant.

WizardSpells.Name: Contact Other Plane
WizardSpells.Description: You mentally contact a demigod, the spirit of a long-dead sage, or some other mysterious entity from another plane.

WizardSpells.Name: Creation
WizardSpells.Description: You pull wisps of shadow material from the Shadowfell to create a nonliving object of vegetable matter within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Dominate Person
WizardSpells.Description: You attempt to beguile a humanoid that you can see within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Dream
WizardSpells.Description: This spell shapes a creature's dreams.

WizardSpells.Name: Geas
WizardSpells.Description: You place a magical command on a creature that you can see within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Hold Monster
WizardSpells.Description: Choose a creature that you can see within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Legend Lore
WizardSpells.Description: Name or describe a person, place, or object.

WizardSpells.Name: Mislead
WizardSpells.Description: You become invisible at the same time that an illusory double of you appears where you are standing.

WizardSpells.Name: Modify Memory
WizardSpells.Description: You attempt to reshape another creature's memories.

WizardSpells.Name: Passwall
WizardSpells.Description: A passage appears at a point of your choice that you can see on a wooden, plaster, or stone surface.

WizardSpells.Name: Planar Binding
WizardSpells.Description: With this spell, you attempt to bind a celestial, an elemental, a fey, or a fiend to your service.

WizardSpells.Name: Scrying
WizardSpells.Description: You can see and hear a particular creature you choose that is on the same plane of existence as you.

WizardSpells.Name: Seeming
WizardSpells.Description: This spell allows you to change the appearance of any number of creatures that you can see within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Telekinesis
WizardSpells.Description: You gain the ability to move or manipulate creatures or objects by thought.

WizardSpells.Name: Telepathic Bond
WizardSpells.Description: You forge a telepathic link among up to eight willing creatures of your choice within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Teleportation Circle
WizardSpells.Description: As you cast the spell, you draw a 10-foot-diameter circle on the ground inscribed with sigils that link your location to a permanent teleportation circle of your choice whose sigil sequence you know and that is on the same plane of existence as you.

WizardSpells.Name: Wall of Force
WizardSpells.Description: An invisible wall of force springs into existence at a point you choose within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Wall of Stone
WizardSpells.Description: A nonmagical wall of solid stone springs into existence at a point you choose within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Chain Lightning
WizardSpells.Description: You create a bolt of lightning that arcs toward a target of your choice that you can see within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Circle of Death
WizardSpells.Description: A sphere of negative energy ripples out in a 60-foot-radius sphere from a point within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Contingency
WizardSpells.Description: Choose a spell of 5th level or lower that you can cast, that has a casting time of 1 action, and that can target you.

WizardSpells.Name: Create Undead
WizardSpells.Description: You can cast this spell only at night.

WizardSpells.Name: Disintegrate
WizardSpells.Description: A thin green ray springs from your pointing finger to a target that you can see within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Eyebite
WizardSpells.Description: For the spell's duration, your eyes become an inky void imbued with dread power.

WizardSpells.Name: Flesh to Stone
WizardSpells.Description: You attempt to turn one creature that you can see within range into stone.

WizardSpells.Name: Freezing Sphere
WizardSpells.Description: A frigid globe of cold energy streaks from your fingertips to a point of your choice within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Globe of Invulnerability
WizardSpells.Description: An immobile, faintly shimmering barrier springs into existence in a 10-foot radius around you and remains for the duration.

WizardSpells.Name: Guards and Wards
WizardSpells.Description: You create a ward that protects up to 2,500 square feet of floor space (an area 50 feet square, or one hundred 5-foot squares or twenty-five 10-foot squares).

WizardSpells.Name: Instant Summons
WizardSpells.Description: You touch an object weighing 10 pounds or less whose longest dimension is 6 feet or less.

WizardSpells.Name: Irresistible Dance
WizardSpells.Description: Choose one creature that you can see within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Magic Jar
WizardSpells.Description: Your body falls into a catatonic state as your soul leaves it and enters the container you used for the spell's material component.

WizardSpells.Name: Mass Suggestion
WizardSpells.Description: You suggest a course of activity (limited to a sentence or two) and magically influence up to twelve creatures of your choice that you can see within range and that can hear and understand you.

WizardSpells.Name: Move Earth
WizardSpells.Description: Choose an area of terrain no larger than 40 feet on a side within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Programmed Illusion
WizardSpells.Description: You create an illusion of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon within range that activates when a specific condition occurs.

WizardSpells.Name: Sunbeam
WizardSpells.Description: A beam of brilliant light flashes out from your hand in a 5-foot-wide, 60-foot-long line.

WizardSpells.Name: True Seeing
WizardSpells.Description: This spell gives the willing creature you touch the ability to see things as they actually are.

WizardSpells.Name: Wall of Ice
WizardSpells.Description: You create a wall of ice on a solid surface within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Arcane Sword
WizardSpells.Description: You create a sword-shaped plane of force that hovers within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Delayed Blast Fireball
WizardSpells.Description: A beam of brilliant light flashes out from your hand in a 5-foot-wide, 60-foot-long line.

WizardSpells.Name: Etherealness
WizardSpells.Description: You step into the border regions of the Ethereal Plane, in the area where it overlaps with your current plane.

WizardSpells.Name: Finger of Death
WizardSpells.Description: You send negative energy coursing through a creature that you can see within range, causing it searing pain.

WizardSpells.Name: Forcecage
WizardSpells.Description: An immobile, invisible, cube-shaped prison composed of magical force springs into existence around an area you choose within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Magnificent Mansion
WizardSpells.Description: You conjure an extradimensional dwelling in range that lasts for the duration.

WizardSpells.Name: Mirage Arcane
WizardSpells.Description: You make terrain in an area up to 1 mile square look, sound, smell, and even feel like some other sort of terrain.

WizardSpells.Name: Plane Shift
WizardSpells.Description: You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence.

WizardSpells.Name: Prismatic Spray
WizardSpells.Description: Eight multicolored rays of light flash from your hand. Each ray is a different color and has a different power and purpose.

WizardSpells.Name: Project Image
WizardSpells.Description: You create an illusory copy of yourself that lasts for the duration.

WizardSpells.Name: Reverse Gravity
WizardSpells.Description: This spell reverses gravity in a 50-foot-radius, 100-foot high cylinder centered on a point within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Sequester
WizardSpells.Description: By means of this spell, a willing creature or an object can be hidden away, safe from detection for the duration.

WizardSpells.Name: Simulacrum
WizardSpells.Description: You shape an illusory duplicate of one beast or humanoid that is within range for the entire casting time of the spell.

WizardSpells.Name: Symbol
WizardSpells.Description: When you cast this spell, you inscribe a harmful glyph either on a surface (such as a section of floor, a wall, or a table) or within an object that can be closed (such as a book, a scroll, or a treasure chest) to conceal the glyph.

WizardSpells.Name: Teleport
WizardSpells.Description: This spell instantly transports you and up to eight willing creatures of your choice that you can see within range, or a single object that you can see within range, to a destination you select.

WizardSpells.Name: Antimagic Field
WizardSpells.Description: A 10-foot-radius invisible sphere of antimagic surrounds you. This area is divorced from the magical energy that suffuses the multiverse.

WizardSpells.Name: Antipathy/Sympathy
WizardSpells.Description: This spell attracts or repels creatures of your choice.

WizardSpells.Name: Clone
WizardSpells.Description: This spell grows an inert duplicate of a living creature as a safeguard against death.

WizardSpells.Name: Control Weather
WizardSpells.Description: You take control of the weather within a 5-mile radius for the duration.

WizardSpells.Name: Demiplane
WizardSpells.Description: You create a shadowy door on a flat solid surface that you can see within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Dominate Monster
WizardSpells.Description: You attempt to beguile a creature that you can see within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Feeblemind
WizardSpells.Description: You blast the mind of a creature that you can see within range, attempting to shatter its intellect and personality.

WizardSpells.Name: Incendiary Cloud
WizardSpells.Description: A swirling cloud of smoke shot through with white-hot embers appears in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Maze
WizardSpells.Description: You banish a creature that you can see within range into a labyrinthine demiplane.

WizardSpells.Name: Mind Blank
WizardSpells.Description: Until the spell ends, one willing creature you touch is immune to psychic damage, any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, divination spells, and the charmed condition.

WizardSpells.Name: Power Word Stun
WizardSpells.Description: You speak a word of power that can overwhelm the mind of one creature you can see within range, leaving it dumbfounded.

WizardSpells.Name: Sunburst
WizardSpells.Description: Brilliant sunlight flashes in a 60-foot radius centered on a point you choose within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Astral Projection
WizardSpells.Description: You and up to eight willing creatures within range project your astral bodies into the Astral Plane.

WizardSpells.Name: Foresight
WizardSpells.Description: You touch a willing creature and bestow a limited ability to see into the immediate future.

WizardSpells.Name: Gate
WizardSpells.Description: You conjure a portal linking an unoccupied space you can see within range to a precise location on a different plane of existence.

WizardSpells.Name: Imprisonment
WizardSpells.Description: You create a magical restraint to hold a creature that you can see within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Meteor Swarm
WizardSpells.Description: Blazing orbs of fire plummet to the ground at four different points you can see within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Power Word Kill
WizardSpells.Description: You utter a word of power that can compel one creature you can see within range to die instantly.

WizardSpells.Name: Prismatic Wall
WizardSpells.Description: A shimmering, multicolored plane of light forms a vertical opaque wall--up to 90 feet long, 30 feet high, and 1 inch thick.

WizardSpells.Name: Shapechange
WizardSpells.Description: You assume a different form.

WizardSpells.Name: Time Stop
WizardSpells.Description: You briefly stop the flow of time for everyone but yourself.

WizardSpells.Name: True Polymorph
WizardSpells.Description: Choose one creature or nonmagical object that you can see within range.

WizardSpells.Name: Weird
WizardSpells.Description: Drawing on the deepest fears of a group of creatures, you create illusory creatures in their minds, visible only to them.

WizardSpells.Name: Wish
WizardSpells.Description: Desire is the most potent source of magic.
